section.title: Introduction
section.para: Some time you may have a requirement to enhance a request with more information then it was provided by the target system. Content Enricher pattern describes various scenarios as well as the component (Enricher), which allows you to address such requirements.

section.title: Header Enricher
section.para: If you only need to add headers to a Message, and they are not dynamically determined by Message content, then referencing a custom implementation may be overkill. For that reason, Spring Integration provides the 'header-enricher' element. <header-enricher input-channel="in" output-channel="out"> <header name="foo" value="123"/> <header name="bar" ref="someBean"/> </header-enricher>
